infos.value: About the Beast's Den that I mentioned earlier...
In addition to awakening materials, you can also acquire incredibly useful items such as recipes for special equipment.
Even if you do not possess any espers just yet, I do not think it would do any harm to review the kind of rewards you can obtain.
There are <color=#00ffff>quests for each esper</color> in the Beast's Den. Decide which esper's <color=#00ffff>awakening materials</color> you wish to acquire...
...and <color=#00ffff>defeat</color> that esper <color=#00ffff>in battle</color> to acquire its <color=#00ffff>awakening materials</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on the Beast's Den?
